Introduction This item is a resource fragment. It is never instantiated, but is used to create full profiles that the end user can use.
Graphical Overview
This graph provides an overview of:

which fragments include this fragment
Profile Fragments
The following are the fragments that are included in this profile. This is included for developers use to understand the hierarchy and commonality of disparate profiles..
